name: Honey Gather
description: This Pokémon produces it's own honey. The quality improves as the Pokémon gets stronger, and there are those that would pay nicely for it.
effect: After this Pokémon completes a mission, they gain extra Poke equal to 50 × their Rank. Once per quest, this Pokemon may consume some of its Honey, healing HP equal to its Rank Bonus as a Bonus Action.
